scripts.build:fab: npm run build && npm run fab:compile
scripts.fab:prepare: mkdir -p .fab/intermediate/{_server,_assets} && cp -R fab-server/* .fab/intermediate/_server && cp -R public/packs/js/* .fab/intermediate/_assets && cp public/packs/manifest.json .fab/intermediate/_server
scripts.fab:compile: npm run fab:clean && npm run fab:prepare && fab-compile
